description: Benchmarking tool to measure Stratum V2 and Stratum (V1) protocol performances in different contexts

targets.expr: sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.17", dst="10.5.0.4"}[20s])) + sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.6", dst="10.5.0.5"}[20s])) + sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.3", dst!="192.168.65.1", dst!="10.5.0.6"}[20s]))

sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.17", src="10.5.0.4"}[20s])) + sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.6", src="10.5.0.5"}[20s])) + sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.3", src!="192.168.65.1", src!="10.5.0.6"}[20s]))

sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.4", dst="10.5.0.17"}[20s])) + sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.5", dst="10.5.0.6"}[20s]))
+ sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{src="10.5.0.2", dst!="192.168.65.1", dst!="10.5.0.4", dst!="10.5.0.5"}[20s]))

sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.4", src="10.5.0.17"}[20s])) + sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.5", src="10.5.0.6"}[20s])) + sum by (id, name) (rate(ntm_bytes_total{dst="10.5.0.2", src!="192.168.65.1", src!="10.5.0.4", src!="10.5.0.5"}[20s]))

title: SRI benchmarking tool
